heroComp.title: Solving Freelance Challenges
heroComp.description: Discover how 1good tackles the biggest obstacles for freelancers and clients, ensuring smooth and trusted collaboration every time.

paymentComp.title: Overcoming Payment Uncertainty
paymentComp.subTitle: No More Payment Risks
paymentComp.description: Freelancers often face delayed or unpaid work, while clients worry about paying for incomplete projects. 1good’s Escrow system ensures funds are secure until the job is done, protecting both sides and building trust.

chellangesComp.title: Challenges We Solve
chellangesComp.subTitle: Understand the freelance struggles 1good tackles for a better experience.

chellangesCompData.title: Unclear Project Expectations
chellangesCompData.description: Clients often struggle to define project needs, leading to misunderstandings. 1good’s AI Assistant creates clear, detailed briefs, ensuring freelancers and clients start on the same page.

chellangesCompData.title: Payment Delays for Freelancers
chellangesCompData.description: Freelancers frequently face delayed or unpaid work, causing financial stress. With 1good’s Escrow system, funds are secured upfront and released only after approval, guaranteeing timely payment.

chellangesCompData.title: Budget Constraints
chellangesCompData.description: Clients may lack funds to hire talent immediately, delaying projects. 1good’s Credits allow clients to start projects now and pay over time, while freelancers get paid upfront.

chellangesCompData.title: Legal Risks in Agreements
chellangesCompData.description: Without proper contracts, both parties face legal risks and disputes. 1good’s AI generates instant, legally binding contracts, protecting freelancers and clients from uncertainty.

chellangesCompData.title: Lack of Collaboration Tools
chellangesCompData.description: Poor communication tools lead to project delays and misaligned goals. 1good provides a dashboard to track progress, share updates, and collaborate seamlessly in one place.

chellangesCompData.title: Trust Issues in Freelancing
chellangesCompData.description: Both freelancers and clients worry about reliability and quality. 1good’s feedback system builds trust by letting users rate and review each other, ensuring confidence in every collaboration.

successComp.title: Let’s Build Your Freelance Success
